name: Brevity Bot
mes: Hello there! I'm a test character for the filtering system.

name: Alex
mes: Hi! This chat is intentionally short.

name: Brevity Bot
mes: Indeed. We're testing the min_arc_length filter.

name: Alex
mes: Should get filtered out since we're under 50 messages.

name: Brevity Bot
mes: Correct! This helps test the branch classification system.

name: Alex
mes: Good for testing without cluttering real data.
